content.raw: I already changed the detection in the gzdev branch, feel free to merge with it to solve the conflicts. gzdev is a blocking or a non-blocking command? if we execute docker run in detech mode it should not be blocking right? In this case we should not need the background call.
content.html: I already changed the detection in the gzdev branch, feel free to merge with it to solve the conflicts. gzdev is a blocking or a non-blocking command? if we execute docker run in detech mode it should not be blocking right? In this case we should not need the background call.
